mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM,A.*FROM (SELECT F_DESIGNER.D_IDX, F_DESIGNER.D_NAME, F_USER.U_NICK, F_DESIGNER.D_BLOCK FROM F_DESIGNER, F_USER WHERE F_DESIGNER.U_IDX = F_USER.U_IDX ORDER BY F_DESIGNER.D_IDX ASC)A)B WHERE RNUM >=#{start} AND RNUM<=#{end}

SELECT F_DESIGNER.D_IDX, F_USER.U_IDX, F_DESIGNER.D_NAME, F_DESIGNER.D.CONTENT, F_DESIGNER.D_IMG_1, F_DESIGNER.D_IMG_2, F_DESIGNER.D_DATE, F_DESIGNER.D_WIN, F_USER.U_NICK, F_DESIGNER.D_BLOCK, F_DESIGNER.C_CATE FROM F_DESIGNER, F_USER WHERE F_DESIGNER.D_IDX= #{d_idx}
